112112211.content:
Ariel pondered upon the rock for a while. After all, being a mermaid, a creature of myth, she was nervous about presenting herself to the humans. Her Daddy would not take kindly to this and she did think about possibilities of being captured...or killed. She almost had second thoughts, however, her eyes glanced over at a small human girl who seemed to be staring directly back at her. Did she spot Ariel?

Ariel waved back at the child to check and the human did the same. The mermaid ducked down to hide but her body was larger than before so hiding her head and her fishtail were proving to be impossible. A few moments later, the girl cried out to her mother "Look Mommy, it's a mermaid!" A crowd of humans were gathering, just marvelling at the beautiful giant mermaid struggling to hide behind the rock. Ariel decided it was the perfect opportunity to introduce herself. She scanned for any possible nets or weapons, then she jumped off the rock and back into the sea. It was a few seconds before Ariel crawled onto the sand. "H-hello I'm Ariel"

The humans backed away for a moment then they gathered around so much Ariel could barely see the beach. All were astonished at her long green tail, her giant fins which were thumping against the sand. "Are you really a mermaid?" an older gentleman asked as his eyes were fixated on her bare breasts.

Ariel giggled. "Of course I am silly" She swayed her tail in different directions. The crowd gasped. "I've wanted to explore land for so long, could someone show me around?" Again another gasp, then they backed away slowly.

"What? What's the matter?" Then a strange glow between her eyes caught her attention. "Hm?"

It wasn't long before a headache erupted. The mermaid cried in pain as it intensified with each passing second. At this point, all the humans were running away not knowing what she could do. "Wait, don't...AHH!" It was similar to her recent full body growth except only her head seemed to be growing. "What's happen...argh" Her beautiful face along with her head and hair was getting bigger and bigger "HELP ME!"

Now passing double the original size and getting really heavy, Ariel decided to hurry back to her Daddy. He should know what to do. She just hoped her tail should still be able to push her through the currents. Although just before she turned, her head grew again, to a point where she could no longer support herself. The arms she was relying on hold up herself and to take her back to the water collapsed under her own weight and her head fell hard sideways onto the sand. It was moments later that her head finally stopped growing. 4 times larger then the size of her original human-sized head and the mermaid could only flail about hoping for a miracle.

11221.content:
Ursula cackled darkly as her body bloated and swelled in all directions, her tentacles curling and writhing as they plumped and lengthened across the ocean floor, gradually kicking up a thickening cloud of sand around the sea witch's swelling form. Her bulging chest heaved with her heavy breaths as she felt the elixir's power fill every cell in her expanding body, making her mind sing with the ecstasy of growth.

"Oh yes, the power!" She exclaimed, her trembling hands gripping her swelling belly as it gurgled and bloated outwards, her whole body trembling as it swelled past seven feet in height. Her lidded eyes fell upon her lair nearby, Ursula licking her lips as a sudden desire seized her.

"I won't need my old lair once I'm fully grown," she thought, shivering with delight as one of her growing tentacles gripped and crushed a large rock to powder. "Might as well demolish it!"

Ursula swam her growing bulk through the maw of the great sea creature's carcass that she had made her home, just about squeezing through the entrance and reaching the main hall that was the former creature's belly. She slammed the lid of her cauldron shut, still containing the batch of the elixir she had mixed up only moments before, and wrapped one of her tentacles around it so that it would be carried to safety as the sea witch continued to grow. She loosed a booming laugh as she settled in the middle of the room and continued to relentlessly swell larger and larger, her enormous rump expanding across the floor as her head rose higher and higher. Her body squeaked and gurgled as it grew, some of her fattening tentacles starting to press against the walls and push through the gaps in the carcass, while the witch raised her plumping arms upward to touch the ceiling as it continued to grow closer. The transformed mer-people in the entrance hall shivered and huddled together as several of her tentacles started to reach into and fill the corridor, gradually blotting out more and more light.

"I will be the mightiest creature in all of the oceans!" Ursula roared, her voice growing deeper and more resonant with her bloating size as her head bumped into the ceiling and cracks ripped across some of the bones making up the walls of her increasingly inadequate lair, some of her tentacles bursting through into the open. "I will take what is rightfully mine!"

Her body started to squirt great gouts of thick blank ink in her increasing arousal, flooding the immediate area and soon leaking out into the open ocean. Ursula grunted and huffed with pleasure as her bloating backside pressed against and then utterly crushed her throne, while one of her tentacles gradually smothered and completely destroyed her mirror. The rest of her furniture soon met a similar end, the witch's head now bent forward entirely as she completely filled the main hall of her lair, her back and hands applying increasing pressure against the ceiling and Ursula loosing a rumbling cackle as it started to crack and break against her bulging body.

"Nothing...urgh," Ursula started as debris started to float down from the overly stressed carcass, the whole structure groaning and cracking loudly as the expanding sea witch continued to swell against it. Several of her tentacles had already burst from her lair into the open, clenching, curling and writhing as they thickened and lengthened further, all of the immediate surroundings now utterly smothered in a great black cloud of ink.

"Will stand...nngh." The enormous sea witch groaned and her eyes fluttered as several parts of the walls gave way, her bloating flesh erupting from the collapsing structure and the tentacles in the entrance hall ripping it apart, utterly smothering the cursed mer-people under their heaving bulk but the nature of their existence keeping them alive.

"In. My. WAY!" Ursula bellowed as she heaved her entire body upright, tearing through the ceiling and expanding to her final height of fifty feet in one final shuddering spurt, the beleaguered carcass of the leviathan surrendering completely as it broke apart and Ursula's mighty body surging in all directions within the darkness. The witch's eyes rolled up and her mouth went slack as she climaxed, her hands clutching her enormous belly as her titanic form rippled in pleasure, more ink squirting forth to cover several miles of the surrounding land, a great black cloud of foreboding on the horizon of any sea creature witnessing it.

Ursula remained where she was for at least half an hour, slowly coming down from her high and letting the ink gradually clear in the undersea currents. The enormous witch chuckled, her voice rumbling across the ocean floor and her tentacles flexing in delight. An evil grin spread across her face as she lifted the tentacle still holding the cauldron up to her face, the metal container now pathetically small but containing the key to Ursula's ascendance. She ran her hands down her enormous bulk as she considered what course of action to take. Two main options were all she was concerned with at this time...

She could consume the rest of the elixir from the cauldron, containing countless doses of the potent liquid, making her immeasurably powerful and ruler of the entire planet, ocean and land. She would be completely invincible, utterly powerful and nigh unbeatable. But she would be alone.

Her other option was to build a following, an army. As he gaze swept across the immediate area she realised she was not the only exile from the mer-people's city of Atlantica. There were other creatures like her exiled or holding grudges against Triton's undersea kingdom, ones she could share this power with. Ursula loosed a rumbling cackle at the thought of assaulting the mer-city and completely dominating it with their size, overpowering the king and becoming the new rulers of the undersea kingdoms. For Triton's was not the only one...

112212.content:
As the enormous sea witch propelled her fifty-foot bulk across the sea floor, her gigantic tentacles sweeping up mouthfuls of small creatures for her to consume, Ursula looked around for someone to share this power with. Every now and again she was distracted at the spectacle of her new power, whole families of whales fleeing her approach and another chuckle rumbled forth from her lips as she relished the might her several-galleon sized body brought her. She paused in her travels as her thoughts were drawn to a possible candidate, one that made her shiver with glee.

When Triton was a young king the mer-city of Atlantica had been threatened by another, an enormous she-white shark of incredible physical power. She was an apex predator that preyed on the mer-people themselves, keeping the whole city locked inside their homes at night as they feared the spectacle of the white huntress, the nineteen-foot mer-shark stalking the streets at night. She would always flee when Triton neared, for only he could match her power with his trident but he could not patrol the entire city alone. Eventually the entire force of the city was able to trap her against a reef and Triton was able to shackle her with the trident's power, banishing her to these desolate lands and saving the city from her depraved predations. Now, Ursula was certain she could break the magical binds holding Lilith in place, and with her elixir could grant her power she had never known. Her loyalty would be ensured through her hatred of the mercity and her might would be an incredible aid in conquering the city.

Ursula's gleeful grin shrank as she considered the risks, however. Lilith might be completely bloodthirsty by now and while Ursula was sure she would be able to defeat Lilith if she tried to attack her, she wanted to rule Atlantica and not annihilate it. If Lilith consumed every living merman and mermaid there would be no people for her to govern with an iron tentacle.

Another option presented itself as the multi-ton sea witch spotted a she-whale in the distance, a fully half-whale half-woman creature. She recognised her as Melody, a woman of Ursula's age who was even fatter than the sea witch. She had an enormous pear-shaped body, a great gut that hung low as she swam and a huge rump that rippled as her powerful tail propelled her through the water. Melody was a glutton of the highest order, a thirty-foot titan of greed that had nearly driven Atlantica to starvation. Triton had exiled her and her two daughters for their unrestrained appetites and while this ensured Atlantica prospered Melody had grown angry and with the wider ocean's delicacies available had grown even fatter. Melody was motivated mainly by her appetite and would be far easier to control than Lilith, and was a woman after Ursula's own heart as the witch smirked and slapped her prodigious belly. She could recruit Melody right now, or travel to where Lilith was imprisoned...

Ursula decided to go for the easier to control mer-whale and retrieved her cauldron from the depths of one of her tentacles, bringing out in front of her face with expert dexterity given the size of her appendages. The witch wanted to at least double Melody's size but had to ensure she was still the largest.

"I must remain the grandest creature in all the oceans," she thought as she delicately measured out a smaller dose of the elixir from the cauldron, containing it in a tiny air bubble. Her enormous heart pounded hard in her equally-enormous chest in anxious excitement at the prospect of growing even larger.Ursula pursed her huge lips and sucked up the air bubble, returning the cauldron safely to the grasp of one of her tentacles and rested her hands on her hips as she settled on the sea floor.

"Ooooooooh," Ursula groaned long and low as her enormous bulk trembled, almost sounding like an underwater foghorn, before her body rumbled and swelled once again, a second dose reacting a lot quicker and sending the panting witch surging out in all directions.

Her tentacles, already between 60 and 70 feet long, plumped and lengthened across the sea floor as Ursula shuddered to greater heights, rippling and clenching in ecstasy as her bulk smothered anything and everything in her path. The burgeoning sea titan couldn't help but cackle in exquisite glee, her voice deepening still and her hands resting on her bulging belly, as her bloating backside crushed even the largest rocks and other debris into sand, relishing her rising perspective as her head rose higher and higher. Some of her swelling appendages found the wreck of a mighty human galleon and she grinned darkly as they quickly pulverised the once mighty ship, punching them through gaps in the wood to allow their growth to burst it open while others simply coiled around the entire galleon and slowly applied pressure, Ursula grunting with pleasure as the wood cracked and caved under her might.

The sea with came to a shuddering halt at 80 feet, her tentacles comfortably reaching 100 feet in length, and she heaved a mighty sigh as her ecstasy faded and left her with a buzzing afterglow. She flexed her gigantic hands with a sly smile as she lazily propelled herself in Melody's direction, smiling wider still as she felt how the underwater currents were forced to adjust to her stupendous bulk, streaming across her heaving gut and bloated breasts. She licked her lips as she rapidly closed the distance to the mer-whale, her tentacles reaching ahead across the sea floor below her to quietly overtake her without her notice, before rearing up to block her path like enormous swaying trees. The she-whale stopped dead and gulped in fear as something blocked out all but the tiniest sliver of light, slowly turning around to be met with the gigantic grinning visage of the new titan of the ocean.

"Hello, Melody." The sea witch rumbled in greeting, Melody feeling her voice reverberate in her chest with its power. "It's been a long time, has it not?" Ursula let her eyes rake across the incredibly fat woman in front of her. Melody's tail was a deep, dark blue in contrast of her human upper body which was the colour of pale sapphire. Jet black shoulder-length hair tumbled in a controlled mess from her head and her eyes were a blue so dark they almost looked black, currently wide with fear as they beheld the titan in front of them.

"Y-yes, um, Ursula, i-t has," the she-whale stammered, trembling with fear and flinching as one of Ursula's tentacles gently coiled itself around her, caressing her impressive gut and fondling her ponderous breasts in their huge bra while firmly trapping her arms against her enormously fat body. "W-what brings you out to see little old me?"

The witch loosed a booming chuckle at Melody's question, her great hulk of a body rippling in time to her laugh.

"Little is not entirely accurate, is it? By all accounts you were one of the grandest creatures to swim the oceans." Ursula smiled with self-satisfaction. "At least, until now."

Melody nodded vigorously, laughing nervously. "Of course, but I always thought you were the most beautiful..."

"Save your vapid praise," Ursula interrupted, a stern expression crossing her enormous face. "I have a proposal for you, Melody. One that I believe you will appreciate. I will let you in on the secret of my recent rise to glory and even partake of it, to give us the power we need to utterly dominate Atlantica and rule the blasted mer-people within! What do you say?"

Melody's fear melted immediately, the mer-whale relaxing in Ursula's grip as she heaved a sigh of relief at the knowledge that Ursula didn't want to kill her. A small grin started to form at the prospect of getting revenge on the city that had shunned her and her daughters and she met Ursula's eyes with a confident smile.

"Why, Ursula, that sounds wonderful," Melody replied, licking her lips and quivering slightly as the image of her eating mer-people whole flashed across her mind, her stomach gurgling loudly in response. "I would eat what I want, all others be damned!"

Ursula cackled and brought the cauldron out from her grasp once more, measuring out the same dose she had taken the first time and gently nudging the air bubble to float towards Melody's expectant face. As quickly as it appeared the cauldron vanished into the folds of Ursula's appendage and the she-whale stared at the small bubble of black liquid in wonder.

"That's it? Just a tiny sip grants so much power?" She asked, awe evident in her voice. Ursula flashed her new partner one of her trademark grins, curling her tentacle a little more around Melody's body as her answer.

The mer-whale opened her impressively large mouth and licked up the bubble with her equally large tongue. She smacked her plump lips as she swallowed it, gasping as she felt the power flood her body almost immediately.

"Oh, Ursula, it's w-wonderful," she stammered quietly before her body trembled and she groaned as she started to swell larger, her great gut gurgling as it pressed outward against Ursula's tentacle while her head started rising, more and more of her overly fed body bulging out around the black appendage.

The mer-whale's head lolled back as the ecstasy of her growth flooded her mind, grunting as she kept surging outward and upward. Ursula hummed in empathic pleasure as she felt the she-whale slowly but surely push her appendage outward, her voice reverberating throughout her bloated body and sending gentle vibrations across Melody's skin, causing her eyelids to flutter and her tongue to loll out of her slack mouth. The mer-whale grunted as she felt her bra tighten against her bloating breasts, bulging and bloating out around the strained cups, while more and more of her swelling body became visible as Ursula's tentacle had to stretch out more and more to maintain its grip on the growing woman. The titanic sea witch started to gently massage the bulking body of her new found partner, several more of her appendages joining in to caress her swelling gut, bloating rump and heaving bosoms. Melody, her arms now free, simply gripped her backside as she continued to shudder and swell, gasping and panting as her mind drowned in euphoria from her expansion and Ursula's ministrations. The witch started huffing as her arousal heightened, a growing cloud of black ink beginning to envelop the pair.

The she-whale grunted loudly, her own voice now deepening with her increased size, as her bra finally snapped apart and let her titanic tits burst free to flop onto her gurgling belly where one of Ursula's extra limbs immediately fondled them, the suckers squelching as they gripped her swelling flesh.

1122122.content:
The monolithic sea-witch made her way to Lilith's coral prison; before she determined whether or not to enlist the mighty hunter in the campaign to subjugate Atlantica, Ursula wanted to have words with the mer-shark. If Lilith was indeed too overcome with bloodlust to be an effective lackey, it shouldn't take more than a few moments for this to become apparent. At the least, the sizable she-shark would provide an enjoyable snack if Ursula had no other use for her.

The towering expanse of coral was probably hugely intimidating to regular mer-folk, but to the titan that Ursula had become, it was merely an unsightly growth on the ocean floor. The sickly green hue of the coral, along with its twisted and deranged shape, gave ample warning to the deadly creature imprisoned within. Having literally grown far beyond being frightened of such nonsense, Ursula approached, taking time to enjoy the feeling of mighty coral formations being effortlessly shattered by the movements of her far-mightier tentacles.

After a few moments, the blubbery behemoth reached the tallest spire of coral, spying her target by the dull glow of the enchanted chains which bound her. Lilith's outline appeared, on first glance, to be identical to a regular mermaid's, albeit over three times the size. However, as one looked closer, you could see that her tail lacked the same graceful curvature. Her tail was rigid, the fin vertical, and composed entirely of the sharp edges from her namesake fish. It was gray with a pearly-white underbelly, which led up to her chest and torso. Her human form was remarkable for its lithe, powerful muscles and pert bare breasts; apparently, modesty was unknown amongst apex predators. A gray dorsal fin extended from her back, albeit compressed against the rock formation she was bound to. Her fingers ended in graceful talons, and a additional angular fin sprouted from each forearm. Billowing platinum hair floated lazily in the water around her.

It was her face which was both her most alluring and most frightening feature. Pale white skin was marked by blood-red lips that were curved into a constant grin, as if Lilith found everything around her to be the butt of a hilarious private joke. Her jet-black eyes were equally mesmerizing, but betrayed no hint of whatever emotion was underneath. It made it hard for Ursula to gauge the she-shark's reaction to the giantess in her midst.

"Why, Lilith, however are you doing?" the seismic sea-witch asked casually, letting the imprisoned beast take a full account of her immense size. "I must say, eternal banishment seems to agree with you."

Lilith spoke, and the reason for her constant smiling was made terrifyingly apparent: her mouth was full of rows upon rows of razor-sharp teeth, so much so that her face was constantly contorted into the semblance of a smirk to hold them all. An additional effect was that the mer-shark's diction and tone were sharp and precise, despite the obvious hesitancy in her voice.

"Triton's chains keep me as I was when he and his school pinned me to this place," she replied. "Eternally at the peak of my strength, and forever denied its use. Not that it matters," she added, looking Ursula up and down, taking in every bit of her prodigious frame. "It seems there is a new predator in my place."

Ursula couldn't help but chuckle at that. "Well, what can I say? You're not the only one that old fool king has wronged. Do you like what you see, my dear?"

Lilith had no patience for games, but she felt obligated to respond to a creature that had clearly risen above her on the food chain. "What I see is a step in the right direction. Those merfolk committed an atrocity in imprisoning me. They are not predators, and had no right to upset the ocean in such a terrible fashion by removing one such as me. Now they breed like shrimp, overrunning the seas with no one to keep them in check. I hope you plan to do so."

Ursula was pleased by the lucidity of the mer-shark's responses, if not the content. Clearly, spending decades alone without any meat had lessened the predator's bloodlust, leaving a cold and cruel cunning in its place. Ursula could make use of that. On the other hand, Lilith owed loyalty to no ideals beyond the basic laws of survival, and would only bend to another's will so long as that other was the more dominant predator. While the sea-witch had no intention of being anything less than completely dominant, the possibility of Lilith turning against he would always exist, no matter how remote. And then there was the problem of the she-shark being overwhelmed by bloodlust again once they attacked Atlantica...but was that worth discarding such a powerful tool?

Ursula smiled down at the chained beast before her, having made her decision...

1131.content:
"Stitch! Wake up!"

The time had finally arrived, and young Lilo Pelekai was intent on taking advantage of every moment. The carnival was back in town, which meant the infamous Pineapple Plunger had also returned for her enjoyment, and she was not about to let it go unridden, especially now that a year had passed and she was most certainly tall enough to ride it, as opposed to just barely meeting the minimum requirement.

Lilo's alien companion, however, was less than thrilled.

"Stiiiitch!"

"Don't wanna!" The blue experiment garbled out in his broken English before whacking Lilo over the head with his pillow. Unlike Lilo, Stitch had no desire to return to the place where he was consistently reminded of how short he was. Lilo had the ability to grow, whereas he did not, and artificially doing so with Jumba's growth ray only served to make him clumsy and slow, so he'd learned his lesson about changing his size...that didn't mean he was open to going back and just watching Lilo ride all the rides he was too small for.

Getting back up after being bopped on the head, the girl humphed and turned to leave. "Fine, I'll just go by myself, and you won't get to have any funnel cake!"

Almost instantly, Stitch was out of bed and dragging Lilo out of the house at top speed.
________________________________________________________________________

Within minutes, Lilo and Stitch were once again in front of the carnival. They could already see Short Stuff, the previously tiny experiment turned giant, getting ready to start his job as a spinning swing ride, one of the most popular rides at the whole carnival. In the distance, the Pineapple Plunger was already going up and down, and the smell of carnival food wafted through the air, causing Stitch's mouth to water in anticipation.

"So I guess you're just gonna spend the day eating everyone's food?" Lilo rolled her eyes.

"Emba-chua!"

"We could go back and get your Kenny disguise, at least then you could actually ride something."

"Naga."

"Fine. You go ahead and start scrounging if you want, I am going to ride the Pineapple Plunger. I'll catch up with you later." Lilo parted ways with Stitch and started making her way towards the ride in question, excited for the opportunity to ride it again after Short Stuff had sabotaged it the year before. She was just about to get in line, when a strong gust of wind suddenly forced her to push down her red muumuu to keep it from being exposed. Once it passed, she looked around for the source, and her eyes widened in awe at the sight.

There was now a whole new section of the carnival, filled with rides and attractions so large and fast that it drew Lilo in like a moth to a flame...or Stitch to coconut cake...almost in a trance, she changed course towards that area, the massive rollercoaster that had blown wind up her skirt calling to her to ride it.

"Hold on a second, kiddo."

Lilo was brought back to reality when a carnival employee stopped her in her tracks. "Oh...sorry, did I bump into you?"

"No, but I can't let you through here."

Almost immediately Lilo's demeanor changed as she stomped her foot in frustration. "And why not?! Do you see the awesome rides through there? It makes the Pineapple Plunger look boring!"

"So you're a thrill seeker," the employee chuckled. "I can respect that. But unfortunately I still can't let you through, all of these rides are real intense and there's a strict height requirement."

"So?" Lilo crossed her arms and glared up at the employee. "I'm tall enough to ride the Pineapple Plunger, and I've only gotten taller since last year. I think I can handle it." She started to walk again, but again she was stopped by the employee. "You're gonna make me stand next to the ruler, aren't you?"

"You can if you want, but I can already tell you that you're too small. It might take you a couple years before you're tall enough to ride these rides. 4-foot-6 is the magic number, and just by eyeballing it, I can guess you're not even 4 feet tall yet."

"You mean I have to grow almost an entire foot before I can go into that adrenaline paradise?"

The employee smiled sympathetically. "I know it stinks kiddo, believe me. I had to wait a long time before I was tall enough to ride these rides too. But for now, just be patient, it's not like we'll never be back. In a couple years, I'm sure you'll pass with flying colors."

"Somehow..." Lilo slouched and slowly turned to walk away. "That doesn't make me feel any better." As she stalked away slowly, the clacking of the rollercoasters starting to fade from her hearing, she sighed in disappointment and shook her head, her long hair swishing around her face as she did so. "Man, I wish I was bigger now, came all this way just to be let down."
